stringArray.description: Similar to the stringArray definition in JSON Schema Draft 4 but allows for the array to be empty

otherField.description: An individual 'other field' in a DXL message. See 'otherFields' in the 'message' property.

required.description: Determines whether or not this other field is required or optional.

message.description: Common properties for all messages which can be sent on a DXL fabric

otherFields.description: The 'other fields' which can appear in a DXL message. 'other fields' add 'header'-like name/value pairs without requiring modifications to be made to the payload.

response.description: A 'response' message which can be sent in response to a 'request' message sent on a DXL fabric

request.description: A 'request' message which can be sent on a DXL fabric

alternateResponses.description: Map of string identifiers/names to corresponding alternative responses to this request. This is used in cases where a request that matches the provided schema is capable of producing responses with different payload structures depending on the request content or the service's processing.

errorResponses.description: Map of integer-based error codes to corresponding 'response' objects. The map describes the possible DXL error response messages which can be returned for a failed request.

requests.description: A map of DXL request topic names to corresponding 'request' objects

event.description: An event message which can be sent on a DXL fabric

isIncoming.description: Whether this event is received (incoming) or sent by the solution.

events.description: A map of DXL event topic names to corresponding 'event' objects

serviceMetadataItem.description: An individual 'item' in a DXL service 'metadata' object. See 'metadata' in the 'service' property.

example.description: Example value for this metadata item

service.description: Information for a service registered with a DXL fabric

requests.description: A map of DXL request topic names to corresponding request definitions under '#/requests' in this document

metadata.description: Metadata which can be registered with the DXL service. The metadata is typically used to include information such as the versions for products that are exposing DXL services, etc.

services.description: A map of DXL 'service type' strings to corresponding 'service' objects

solution.description: Information for an individual DXL solution

events.description: A map of DXL event topic names to corresponding event definitions under '#/events' in this document

services.description: A map of DXL 'service type' strings to corresponding service definitions under '#/services' in this document

openDxlApi.description: The OpenDXL API version of this document

solutions.description: A map of DXL solution names to corresponding 'solution' objects
